meanings: [명사] abnormality, disorder, [형용사] strange, odd, weird, bizarre, peculiar; (정상이 아니다) abnormal; (유별나다) unusual, uncommon

vlive.korean: 방송 이상하게 나간다고! It's going to look weird! 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.99
근데 이상하게... 50분 넘어가면... It's weird, but... 듣기 View video WINNER : 숙제도우미(숙제 도와드립니다)
왜 다 이상하게 웃었어요? Why did you smile like that? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 리더와 막내즈
vlive.english: Why did you smile like that?

vlive.korean: 너무 비유를 이상하게 했던 건가? Is it a weird anology? 듣기 View video NCT : VOICE ONLY ㅋ
[이상이요? 우리 동표] 근데 좀 이상하게 만든 거 같아... [Weird? Dongpyo...] I think it looks a bit weird. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [손동표] 올림포스에 에로스가 있다면 지구엔 사랑둥이 동표가 있거든요💘 (Dongpyo singing number song)
vlive.english: [Weird? Dongpyo...] I think it looks a bit weird.

examples.korean: The loudspeaker seemed to distort his voice. 발음듣기 스피커로 들리는 그의 목소리가 이상하게 들렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The loudspeaker seemed to distort his voice. 발음

examples.korean: He was dressed in an odd assortment of clothes. 발음듣기 그는 옷을 이상하게 조합해서 입고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was dressed in an odd assortment of clothes. 발음

examples.korean: His voice sounded strange on the phone. 발음듣기 그의 전화 목소리가 이상하게 들렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His voice sounded strange on the phone. 발음

examples.korean: My watch had mysteriously disappeared. 발음듣기 내 시계가 이상하게 어디로 사라져 버린 상태였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: My watch had mysteriously disappeared. 발음

examples.korean: The report is strangely silent on this issue. 발음듣기 그 보고서가 이 쟁점에 대해서는 이상하게 침묵하고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The report is strangely silent on this issue. 발음
